programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Perspective
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 162 The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband. Rather than turn Riker over for unfavorable trial, the Enterprise reconstructs the facts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Yesterday's Enterprise
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 163 The Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, where they find Picard and crew in a constant state of war with the Klingons, and only Guinan knows it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Offspring
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 164 After returning from a cybernetics conference to the Enterprise, Data creates his own "child," much to the chagrin of his captain, and without regards to the ramifications with Starfleet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 165 A Klingon commander boards the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 166 Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Captain's Holiday
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 167 After mediating a difficult peace agreement, Captain Picard is encouraged to take a much needed rest on a vacationing planet, where he's visited by a strange race from the future, in search of a dangerous weapon.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tin Man
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 168 The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to attack it in an act of vengeance.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hollow Pursuits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 169 A shy member of the "Enterprise" crew becomes addicted to the holodeck, where relationships are easier there than in real life, when his knowledge is needed in engineering.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Most Toys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 170 When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sarek
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 171 Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Menage a Troi
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 172 When Deanna's mother spurns advances made by a Ferengi Daimon, he takes it upon himself to kidnap the two of them, along with Commander Riker and steal them away aboard his ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Transfigurations
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 173 The Enterprise finds a deserted planet where a ship has crashed, and, with it, the lone survivor with no memory, but extraordinary healing powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 174 Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives...only to find a big hole in the ground where the town used to be, and discovers the Borg are behind the attack.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E17 - A Constellation Of Doubt
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 John Crichton struggles to learn the location of the mysterious Katratzi, whilst watching a television documentary about himself and the aliens.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E18 - Prayer
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 18 Crichton and Scorpius travel to one of the 'unrealized realities' where Crichton believes he heard Stark say 'Katratzi.'

programme.title: Robocop 2 - Robocop 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3 - Robocop 3
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Automata - Automata
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Android Cop - Android Cop
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness.

programme.title: Metamorphosis - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When his experiments in genetics are mocked by his colleagues, maverick scientist Dr. Peter Houseman takes extreme measures to prove that his untested anti-aging serum works.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Loose Lips Sink Ships
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 The Sheriff and his team face a tough decision and the consequences of one participant's actions put the remaining participants in very real danger.

programme.title: 60 Days In - You Don't Belong Here
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Now that one of the participants has blown his/her cover, Sheriff Lamb and his team are forced to make a decision: end the program early, or risk the lives of the remaining participants.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Reunion Special
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 For the first time, all seven participants will meet with the Sheriff and his team to discuss the craziest moments from their time in the Pinal County Jail.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Aaron
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 On January 31, 2011, 14-year-old Aaron shot his neighbor, 14-year-old Alana, in her home in Harlem, Georgia. Aaron was sentenced to life without parole at 15.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Nightwatch - When Work Becomes Family
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 It's New Year's in New Orleans and gun violence is rampant as Police and EMS deal with armed robberies and shootings. Plus, EMT Gavin returns to the job, and everyone celebrates a new addition to the family.

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Fallen Brother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The city is in mourning after a well-loved Police officer is shot and killed on duty. Vic and P chase a suspect following an altercation with another officer.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Mardi Gras
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Mardi Gras is the biggest party of the year in Southern Louisiana, and it doesn't just happen in New Orleans. Terrebonne Parish is home to the second biggest Mardi Gras in the state.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Hunt for the Swamp Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The local shrimpers in Terrebonne Parish are notorious for handling their own problems and don't like interference from the cops.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Geaux Speed Racers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Terrebonne Parish can be a tough place for teenagers to find weekend entertainment, so deputies will investigate all sorts of calls involving the bayou's most troublesome kids.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - The Great Swamp Escape
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In Terrebonne Parish, the shrimping season is about to get underway as fishermen are getting their trawl boats ready and stretching out their nets.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Grangegorman Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 121 This case, involving Ireland’s only living serial killer, was brought to a close after nearly two decades, with the help of advances in forensic science.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tracing Suzanne Nauman's Murderer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 122 The story of the violent death of a young, woman, how her murder investigation led police to another case, and how the science of DNA profiling played a central role in unravelling the truth.

programme.title: The First 48 - Downstream Drifter / Murder in Room 162 (#18)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In San Antonio, TX, Det. Tim Angell and his partners find a nameless man beaten to death floating in a creek; they must race to identify the victim and find anyone who may have known him.

programme.title: The First 48 - Twisted Honor / Vultures (#21)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 In Phoenix, Det. Dave Barnes must track down desperate lovers on the lam to solve a savage shotgun murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Silence in the Grove / Show Stopper (#22)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 In Miami's Coconut Grove, Sgt. Joe Schillaci and his team try to solve a near-impossible case of four men shot while sitting in their car. The shooting left an innocent passenger dead...but the three survivors refuse to name names.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Trail of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In Harris County Texas, a 38-year-old man is stabbed to death in his own home leaving behind two children and his wife. Investigators track down the suspect thanks to surveillance video and some good old fashion detective work.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Burned Alive
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 A woman is badly beaten, set on fire, and left to die in a trailer on the outskirts of Houston. Investigators discover that the assault was likely a revenge attack.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Into the Night
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 An attempted mugging turned to murder when a man stopping at a gas station for a lottery ticket and beer was shot and killed.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Burning Rage
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 In Birmingham, AL, a woman, her son and her young niece are stabbed more than 75 times then set on fire inside their apartment. Investigators zero in on the victims' relative.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Spoiled, Rotten, & Ruthless
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 70 A look at three members of an affluent family who are mowed down inside their home.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Poughkeepsie Predator
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 71 A look at a serial killer in upstate New York.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Grim Sleeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 72 A killer terrorizes South Los Angeles during the 1980's, then goes dormant for 14 years only to resurface.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Dreaming of Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 73 A woman's dream leads cops in coastal Florida to the body of a dead woman hidden in the bushes on a beach.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Dischord
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 36 At the Paris Opera House, an infatuated stagehand takes on the murderous role of the villain.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Snake Charmer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 37 A Texas rodeo star is devastated when he comes home to find his beauty-queen wife dead with multiple rattlesnake bites on her feet.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Afrobeats 24/7 TV programme
programme.desc: Afrobeats are primarily produced in Lagos, Accra and London. Paul Gilroy of The Black Atlantic reflects on the changing London music scene as a result of changing demographics: 'We are moving towards an African majority that is diverse in both its cultural habits and its relationship to colonial and post-colonial governance, so the move away from Caribbean domination needs to be placed in this environment'. Afro-pop (not to be confused with Afrobeat or Afroswing), also known as Afro-fusion (also called Afropop and Afrofusion), is an umbrella term used to describe popular music from West Africa and the diaspora originally developed in Nigeria.

Paul Gilroy of The Black Atlantic reflects on the changing London music scene as a result of changing demographics: 'We are moving towards an African majority that is diverse in both its cultural habits and its relationship to colonial and post-colonial governance, so the move away from Caribbean domination needs to be placed in this environment'. Afro-pop (not to be confused with Afrobeat or Afroswing), also known as Afro-fusion (also called Afropop and Afrofusion), is an umbrella term used to describe popular music from West Africa and the diaspora originally developed in Nigeria.

programme.title: NASA TV Media programme
programme.desc: NASA TV airs a variety of regularly scheduled, pre-recorded educational and public relations programming 24 hours a day on its various channels. The network also provides an array of live programming, such as 24-hour coverage of missions, events (spacewalks, media interviews, educational broadcasts), press conferences and rocket launches.

programme.title: Earth TV programme
programme.desc: EarthTV Network GmbH je njemačka satelitska televizijska mreža koja emitira prijenose uživo sa svoje mreže kamera diljem svijeta. Kamere se nalaze u poznatim gradovima kao i u manje poznatim mjestima. EarthTV kamere obično prikazuju plaže, planine, primorska odmarališta ili obrise velikih gradova.
